Home.name: Home
Home.description: The comfort of home fills you with the strength of hope.

success.text: You pass through the forest with the safety of the beaten path
You gather some lumber and gain familiarity with this forest.

failure.text: You cannot find anything worth gathering, and end up spending too long looking.

success.text: You catch some small game and gain familiarity with this forest.

failure.text: You cannot find anything worth hunting, and end up spending too long looking.

Dense Forest.name: Dense Forest
Dense Forest.description: You come across a large mass of tree and bark, almost creating a wall.  Locals tell of an old wizard living around here.

success.text: You skirt the edge of the forest with relative ease
You gather some lumber and gain familiarity with this forest.

failure.text: You cannot find anything worth gathering, and end up spending too long looking.

success.text: You hack your way through, gaining some lumber and familiarity with this forest.

failure.text: You try to chop through the woods, but the forest appears too tough and you must turn around.
After tireless searching, you cannot find the wizard.  Perhaps he doesn't want to be found, or perhaps he doesn't exist at all.

Encounter with the wizard.name: Encounter With the Wizard
Encounter with the wizard.description: You find the old wizard practicing his magic in a small clearing

success.text: You observe the wizard undetected and learn much of his magic

failure.text: The wizard spots your snooping and hurls a fireball in your direction, causing you to drop some resources in your escape.  At least you got a good look at that fireball spell.

success.text: The wizard is happy to trade an artifact of his for some gold.

failure.text: The wizard is not willing to sell for what you have.  You continue on your way without further incident.

success.text: You chose to let the wizard be and continue on your way.

Recruit Jimbo.name: Recruit Jimbo
Recruit Jimbo.description: Jimbo wants to join your party.

Visit Jimbo's Shack.name: Visit Jimbo's Shack
Visit Jimbo's Shack.description: Well at least Jimbo is happy to be here

success.text: Jimbo joins you on your journey

failure.text: Jimbo cannot join you (He may be busy, or he may be with you already.)
Jimbo is not traveling with you currently

Flower Grove.name: Flower Grove
Flower Grove.description: A field of highly deadly deadly nighshadestretches before you

success.text: You revel in your collection of deadly flora

failure.text: You don't have enough flowers to properly revel

success.text: You swipe a bushel of nightshade

failure.text: You have enough nightshade to kill an army.  Don't be greedy
